document.docAuthor: Chen, Huayan, Talamas, Elijah J & Pang, Hong
document.masterDocTitle: Notes on the hosts of Trissolcus Ashmead (Hymenoptera: Scelionidae) from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Host associations. This species was reared from the eggs of
Hippotiscus dorsalis
Stal ( Pentatomidae ),
Urochela luteovaria
Distant ( Urostylididae ) and some unidentified species of Pentatomidae in China.
